description: Scoping Opinion submitted under Part 4, Regulation 15 (1) of The Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (EIA Regulations) in respect of the development of 'Plot 5' of LBL reference DC/15/92295 (as amended) (approved March 2016) for the development of 560 new residential units, in five buildings ranging from 6 to 30 storeys; 5,200m2 commercial (B1/A1/A3) use; 1,800m2 public amenity and playspace provision; and 19 accessible car parking spaces and 1,100 cycle parking spaces, at Land Bound by Grove Street, Dragoon Street and Evelyn, Oxestalls Road, SE8.
site_name: CROWN AND NEW BALTIC, PARK AND BRIDGE AND VICTORIA WHARVES, BOUNDED BY GROVE STREET,  DRAGOON STREET AND EVELYN STREET, OXESTALLS ROAD, LONDON, SE8
